sourcesContent: import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { AuthService } from 'src/app/services/authentication.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-user-settings', templateUrl: './user-settings.component.html', styleUrls: ['./user-settings.component.css'] }) export class UserSettingsComponent implements OnInit { constructor() { } ngOnInit(): void { // Initialization logic goes here } }
